title: Marvel's Spider-Man
resume: An insecure but courageous and intelligent teen named Peter Parker, a new student of Midtown High, is bitten by a radioactive spider and given powers. He becomes a hero named Spider-Man after the death of his uncle and he must adapt to this new way of life.

View All Seasons Social Reviews  1 Discussions  0 A review by Ch Walid  8.0 Written by  Ch Walid  on January 24, 2018 I enjoyed this TV Show obviously because it's Spider-Man but that doesn't mean that it's perfect, so i've got some things to say about it: I like the fact that they're trying to do something new with Spider-Man, but i think they focus too much in his hero side more than his normal life side. The animations, the art and the CGI is the worst that i've ever seen in a Spider-Man TV Show, needs a lot of improvement, especially the cars and the backgrounds. Spider-Man is way too cringy, and makes some stupid jokes. there're more things but, the main problem that drives me insane is t...  read the rest.
